There were 3 other sightings in Phoenix on or around March 13th 1997
Summary: long bomerang shaped..plus 3 fyling round lights triangle
divs: Sighting Detailsi live in phoenix az at time of the ufo .Been ther for 4 yrs. from CT. We live on 2385 West turney Ave phoenix AZ. my son,me,my wife were watching tv. my neighbors came over and told me to go out side. went out.went to clear open parking lot at condo complex.looked up and saw over Camel Hump Mtn was a triangle shaped something.hovered quietly. for 20 something mins. then 3 round lights came out on right(my right looking at craft) and slowly moved fron a triangle shape to dancing balls in the sky. when the little lights came out the big lights dimmed out. we watch the lillte lights moved frm big to small making shapes then dissappeared back into the big set of lights. when we watch the whole thing every hair on your body was standing up. my son wanted in, was 3 yrs old.
